item.title: Kelsey Park - Litter, 21st October
item.description:
Iâ€™m sharing a what3words address to help you find this specific location. Tap to see exactly where it is: ///launch.rash.vast https://w3w.co/launch.rash.vast Litter around bench and wider area. Please extend litter pick to area directly behind bench where a fence/barrier mounting block is that also needs removing. The area around the bench also needs litter picking, extending out into further vegetation and woodland to the right. Photos show area. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelsey Park Avenue, Beckenham, London

item.title: Inadequate Lighting - Kilburn Pl Street, 21st October
item.description:
Thank you for your response (through report : 8318442) and for replacing the faulty lantern. However, despite this repair, the overall lighting on Kilburn Place remains inadequate. With only three lanterns covering the entire street, there are still extensive dark spots that create unsafe conditions for residents and passers-by. These poorly lit areas continue to attract antisocial and illegal activities, making the street feel insecure and unsafe at night. I strongly urge the council to conduct a more comprehensive assessment of the lighting coverage and consider installing additional lanterns to ensure the entire street is properly illuminated and secure for everyone.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kilburn Place, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet
